p: To identify differentially expressed transcripts, quantitation of mRNA isoforms in the curated transcriptome was first performed using short-read expression in DESeq2 using independent hypothesis weighting [ 28]. This information, including the experimental design matrix and the genome annotation file from the curated transcriptome characterized previously, was subjected to functional isotranscriptomics (FIT) analysis in tappAS ( Figure 1) [ 31].
